sections.heading: Prisoner; deposition; manner of taking
sections.text: While a prisoner's deposition is being taken he shall remain in the custody of the officer having him in charge, who shall afford reasonable facilities for the taking of the deposition.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 362, p. 454;R.S.1913, ยง 7926;C.S.1922, ยง 8868;C.S.192
